Title: Underdogs
Writer: Eduardo Sacheri, Gastón Gorali, Juan José Campanella, Eduardo Sacheri (story by), Axel Kuschevatzky (story by), Gastón Gorali (story by), Juan José Campanella (story by), Roberto Fontanarrosa (inspired by the story "Memoirs of a Right Winger" by)
Actors: Gabriel Almirón, Federico Cecere, Ezequiel Cipols, Luciana Falcón
Plot: A young man named Amadeo sets off on an unexpected adventure with the players of his beloved Foosball game.
